kapziel: sorry, not available now

Will check, but where could i check for some concept description? Would like to know more how would it ideally work. We have some Prototypefund in Berlin, supporting opensource/open data projects (by Open Knowledge fundation) and was thinging to hack on sth similar but would like to see what did you come up with... How could people share their bookmarks in a structured and automated way...
ninabreznik: a 2014 concept document is here: <https://www.newschallenge.org/challenge/2014/submissions/hackfoldr-community-collaboration-organized>
slackbot2's url: [News Challenge - How can we strengthen the Internet for free expression and innovation? - hackfoldr: Community Collaboration Organized]
(the concept is simply using a collaborative spreadsheet — ethercalc and google spreadsheet currently supported, but anything that output CSV / JSON will do — as backend.)
